channel.title: How do you make a ::offer command?

item.title: How do you make a ::offer command?
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

fruitloopdeadox:

how would you make a command that offers money?

3 options:

I) Learn Java
2)
C) Results

[hr]

My, oh my, I’m such a clever little bastard :mad:

Here’s an idea: Use the RSCD source?
[/quote]most noobs cant set it up. most noobs cant even set divinepk up. and i actually prefer divinepk to rscd because i like pk servers better. :)[/quote]

Then they are better off jumping off a cliff then.

item.title: How do you make a ::offer command?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:2, topic:217336”]You learn java, then you spend a lot of time around the client to get used to it, you then put you’re java and client knowledge together and voila, you then know how to do the ::offer command. You’ll also not ask as many questions and asking people to do something for you, which is also a gain.[/quote]but he probably wont want that as it takes longer, and is harder to do. he just wants help with everything, then he will claim 100% credits for things that other people told him how to do.
thats what most moparscapers do.

Read full topic
